message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to part with it for $15000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can you meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $12000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $13500. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but $13500 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to meet you at $11000. Can you consider that?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $11000 is a bit of a stretch for you. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer it to you for $12800. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12800 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to meet you at $10500. Can you consider that?

I understand that $10500 is still a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll offer it to you for $11200. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11200 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to meet you at $10500. Can you consider that?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $11200, Bob. I've already compromised quite a bit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I'll offer it to you for $11000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $11000. I'm willing to meet you at $10000. This is my final offer.
